amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that the Director of the Office for State and Local government Coordination and Preparedness be given limited authority to approve requests from the State Homeland Security Directors to reprogram Federal homeland security grant funds to address specific security requirements based on credible threat assessments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3646 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3646 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Talent. (consideration: CR S9208-9209; text: CR S9209) To express the sense of the Senate that the Director of the Office for State and Local government Coordination and Preparedness be given limited authority to approve requests from the State Homeland Security Directors to reprogram Federal homeland security grant funds to address specific security requirements based on credible threat assessments.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3646 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
